blocks.content: 1.2 Web Components: Frontend / Backend / Database / Hosting
A complete website is not just what you see in the browser‚Äîit is made up of several parts working together. Frontend, Backend, Database, and Hosting are the four core pillars of web development.
The frontend is the part that users directly see and interact with. It is mainly responsible for **interface design, interactive logic, and user experience**.

items: **Key learning points**: UI/UX design principles, responsive design, cross-browser compatibility.

blocks.title: Tip
blocks.content: The frontend is like the 'storefront,' shaping the user's first impression and interactive experience.
The backend handles business logic, data exchange, and server operations. It is the 'brain' of the website, ensuring the frontend actions receive proper responses.

items: **Common languages**: Node.js (JavaScript), Python (Django, Flask), Java (Spring), PHP (Laravel).
**API**: Provides data interfaces for the frontend, such as REST API or GraphQL.
**Key learning points**: Understanding server architecture, API design, security authentication.

blocks.title: Tip
blocks.content: If the frontend is the storefront, the backend is the 'kitchen,' handling orders and logical operations.
The database is responsible for storing and managing data. Whether it's user accounts, product lists, or message content, the database handles storage and retrieval.

items: **Features**: Relational databases are suitable for structured data; NoSQL offers more flexibility and supports unstructured data.
**Key learning points**: CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete), indexing, query languages (SQL).

blocks.title: Tip
blocks.content: The database is like the 'warehouse,' responsible for securely storing and quickly providing data.
Hosting makes a website available on the internet, allowing users to access it anytime.

items: **Free platforms**: GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, Lovable.
**Key learning points**: Deployment process, domain setup, HTTPS encryption.

blocks.title: Tip
blocks.content: Hosting is like the 'location'‚Äîjust like placing a store inside a mall, it makes it convenient for customers to visit anytime.
